PHRASE.LANG: In celebration of the 3rd anniversary, PlayStation®Home has a small gift to everyone. Please enjoy! [#Legal]
Pour fêter ses trois ans, PlayStation®Home offre un petit cadeau à tout le monde ! Profitez-en ! [#Legal]
Ein Geschenk zur Feier des dritten Geburtstags von PlayStation®Home gibt es für jeden ein kleines Geschenk. Viel Spaß! [#Legal]
Per festeggiare il 3°anniversario, il team di PlayStation®Home ha un regalo per tutti. Buon divertimento! [#Legal]
Para conmemorar el 3.º aniversario, el equipo de PlayStation®Home tiene un regalo para todos. ¡Disfrútalo! [#Legal]
In celebration of the 3rd anniversary, PlayStation®Home has a small gift to everyone. Please enjoy! [#Legal]
3주년을 기념하여 PlayStation®Home팀이 작은 선물을 준비하였습니다. 부디 사용해 주세요! [#Legal]
In celebration of the 3rd anniversary, PlayStation®Home has a small gift to everyone. Please enjoy! [#Legal]
